description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. ArkX is a next-gen blockbuster. By blockbuster, we mean a game you can bust some blocks, what else? Tons of Bonuses, Naughty bosses, Trophies, multiplayers battles... Arkanoid's fan cannot miss this one!
description.short: ArkX is a next-gen blockbuster. By blockbuster, we mean a game you can bust some blocks, what else? Tons of Bonuses, Naughty bosses, Trophies, multiplayers battles... Arkanoid's fan cannot miss this one!
